column1: # "rocks" remix - contains a few items from rocks that are not found in AATO/PFAA (but are required
#       by GLEM). Used the Gael-de-Sailly fork. Because the "mineral" mod clashes with a Grailtest
#       mod, everything has been grouped into a hypothetical "rocks" mod
# See the STANDARDS file for more information about what belongs in each category, and what does not
# pfaa packages which duplicate rocks content
